passages.name: travelInsurer
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have travel insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->email
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->email]]"
                                 providers="norwegian"
                                 key="currentInsurerTravel"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: OfferSuccess
passages.text:
<ExternalRedirect to="Offer">
</ExternalRedirect>

passages.name: currentlyInsured
passages.text:
<Message>
  Are you already covered by another insurance?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="contents"
  >
    [[Yes, by a contents insurance->contentsInsurer]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="travel"
  >
    [[Yes, by a travel insurance->travelInsurer]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="contentsAndTravel"
  >
    [[Yes, by both a travel and contents insurance->contentsAndTravelInsurer]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="prevInsurance"
          value="false"
  >
    [[No, I'm not covered->email]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: numberCoInsured
passages.text:
<Message>
  Nice. How many others would you like to be covered by the insurance?
</Message>

<Redirect to="[[errorSize]]"
          when="livingSpace > 250"
>
</Redirect>

<Response>
  <when expression="coInsured == 1">
    Me + {coInsured} other
  </when>
  <when expression="coInsured > 1">
    Me + {coInsured} others
  </when>
  <when expression="coInsured == 0">
    Just me
  </when>
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="2"
              minvalue="0"
              key="coInsured"
              next="[[Continue->name]]"
              unit="other people"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Number of co-insured
    </Title>
    <Description>
      E.g. partner, children or roomies that should be covered. Co-insured must live together with you to be covered by your insurance
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: email
passages.text:
<Message>
  OK! Enter you email address below to proceed to your price quote
</Message>

<TextAction placeholder="your.email@here.now"
            mask="Email"
            key="email"
            next="[[Continue->youthEligibilityCheck]]"
>
</TextAction>

passages.name: youthEligibilityCheck
passages.text:
<Redirect to="[[Offer]]"
          key="isYouth"
          value="false"
          when="birthDate.Age > 30 || livingSpace > 50 || coInsured > 0"
>
</Redirect>

<Redirect to="[[youth]]"
          when="true"
>
</Redirect>

passages.name: contentsAndTravelInsurer
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have contents insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->travelInsurer
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->travelInsurer]]"
                                 providers="norwegian"
                                 key="currentInsurerContents"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: errorCoInsured
passages.text:
<Message>
  Unfortunately, we can only insure homes with a maximum of 6 people
</Message>

<Message>
  If you want to, you can subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know when we can insure homes with more than 6 people!
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option>
    [[Yes, subscribe to the newsletter->NewsletterSuccess]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: name
passages.text:
<Message>
  OK! What's your name?
</Message>

<Redirect to="[[errorCoInsured]]"
          when="coInsured > 5"
>
</Redirect>

<TextActionSet next="[[Continue->birthDate]]">
  <TextAction title="First name"
              placeholder="Hedvig"
              large="true"
              key="firstName"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="Surname"
              placeholder="Hedvigsen"
              large="true"
              key="lastName"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: contentsInsurer
passages.text:
<Message>
  What insurer do you have contents insurance with?
</Message>

<PreviousInsuranceProviderAction next="[[Continue->email
]]"
                                 skip="[[Okay->email]]"
                                 providers="norwegian"
                                 key="currentInsurerContents"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Current insurance
    </Title>
    <Description>
      Enter your current insurer and we can help make the process of switching to Hedvig easier!
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</PreviousInsuranceProviderAction>

passages.name: sizeInput
passages.text:
<Message>
  How many square meters is it?
</Message>

<Response>
  {livingSpace} square meters
</Response>

<NumberAction placeholder="52"
              key="livingSpace"
              minvalue="1"
              next="[[Continue->numberCoInsured]]"
              unit="square meters"
>
  <Tooltip>
    <Title>
      Residence size
    </Title>
    <Description>
      The total living space of the residence. If you're unsure you can find the information in your lease or purchase contract
    </Description>
  </Tooltip>
</NumberAction>

passages.name: CreateQuoteError
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: birthDate
passages.text:
<Message>
  What's your birth date?
</Message>

<Response>
  {birthDate}
</Response>

<TextAction placeholder="yyyy-mm-dd"
            mask="BirthDate"
            key="birthDate"
            next="[[Continue->currentlyInsured]]"
            unit="birth date (yyyy-mm-dd)"
>
</TextAction>

passages.name: ownershipType
passages.text:
<Message>
  Do you rent or own the apartment?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="type"
          value="RENT"
  >
    [[I rent it->address]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="type"
          value="OWN"
  >
    [[I own it->address]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: NewsletterSuccess
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: address
passages.text:
<Message>
  What's the address?
</Message>

<Response>
  {street}, {zipCode}
</Response>

<TextActionSet next="[[Continue->sizeInput]]">
  <TextAction title="Address"
              placeholder="Examplestreet 21"
              large="true"
              key="street"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="Postal code"
              mask="NorwegianPostalCode"
              placeholder="0123"
              key="zipCode"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: errorSize
passages.text:
<Message>
  Unfortunately we can currently only insure residences up to 250 square meters
</Message>

<Message>
  If you want to, you can subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know when we are able to insure residences in your size
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option>
    [[Yes, subscribe to the newsletter->NewsletterSuccess]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: youth
passages.text:
<Message>
  Bonus question! Since you are under 31 years old you are eligible for our youth insurance bundle with a fixed price of 149 kr/mo. What do you say?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="isYouth"
          value="true"
  >
    [[Yes, I want youth insurance->Offer]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="isYouth"
          value="false"
  >
    [[No, I want regular insurance->Offer]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: Start
passages.text:
<Message>
  Hi! Let's get you an offer, it'll only take a minute
</Message>

<Message>
  Do you want an offer for your current apartment or are you moving?
</Message>

<SelectAction>
  <Option key="isMover"
          value="false"
  >
    [[My current apartment->ownershipType]]
  </Option>
  <Option key="isMover"
          value="true"
  >
    [[I’m moving->ownershipType]]
  </Option>
</SelectAction>

passages.name: Offer
passages.text:
<Message>
  Great, your offer is ready!
</Message>

<GraphQLApi next="[[OfferSuccess]]">
  <Mutation>
    mutation CreateNorwegianCombo(
			$norwegianHomeContentsQuoteId: ID!
			$norwegianTravelQuoteId: ID!
			$firstName: String!
			$lastName: String!
			$birthDate: LocalDate!
			$street: String!
			$zipCode: String!
			$livingSpace: Int!
			$coInsured: Int!
			$isYouth: Boolean!
			$type: NorwegianHomeContentsType!
			$email: String!
			$currentInsurerTravel: String
			$currentInsurerContents: String
		) {
		createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote: createQuote(input: {
		  	id: $norwegianHomeContentsQuoteId,
			firstName: $firstName,
			lastName: $lastName,
			birthDate: $birthDate,
			norwegianHomeContents: {
			  street: $street
			  zipCode: $zipCode
			  coInsured: $coInsured
			  isYouth: $isYouth
			  livingSpace: $livingSpace
			  type: $type
			}
			email: $email
			currentInsurer: $currentInsurerContents
		  }) {
			... on CompleteQuote {
			  id
			  insuranceCost {
				monthlyGross {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyDiscount {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyNet {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
			  }
			}
		  }
		  createNorwegianTravelQuote: createQuote(input: {
		  	id: $norwegianTravelQuoteId,
			firstName: $firstName,
			lastName: $lastName,
			birthDate: $birthDate,
			norwegianTravel: {
			  coInsured: $coInsured
			  isYouth: $isYouth
			}
			email: $email
			currentInsurer: $currentInsurerTravel
		  }) {
			... on CompleteQuote {
			  id
			  insuranceCost {
				monthlyGross {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyDiscount {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
				monthlyNet {
				  amount
				  currency
				}
			  }
			}
		  }
  		}
  </Mutation>
  <GeneratedVariable key="norwegianHomeContentsQuoteId"
                     type="uuid"
                     storeas="norwegianHomeContentsQuoteId"
  >
  </GeneratedVariable>
  <GeneratedVariable key="norwegianTravelQuoteId"
                     type="uuid"
                     storeas="norwegianTravelQuoteId"
  >
  </GeneratedVariable>
  <Variable key="firstName"
            from="firstName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="lastName"
            from="lastName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="currentInsurerTravel"
            from="currentInsurerTravel"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="currentInsurerContents"
            from="currentInsurerContents"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="coInsured"
            from="coInsured"
            as="int"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="birthDate"
            from="birthDate"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="isYouth"
            from="isYouth"
            as="boolean"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="street"
            from="street"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="zipCode"
            from="zipCode"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="livingSpace"
            from="livingSpace"
            as="int"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="type"
            from="type"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="email"
            from="email"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Error next="[[CreateQuoteError]]">
  </Error>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.amount"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyGross"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.currency"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyGrossCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.amount"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyNet"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.currency"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyNetCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.amount"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyDiscount"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianHomeContentsQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.currency"
          as="norwegianContentsMonthlyDiscountCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.amount"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyGross"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyGross.currency"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyGrossCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.amount"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyNet"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyNet.currency"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyNetCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.amount"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyDiscount"
  >
  </Result>
  <Result key="createNorwegianTravelQuote.insuranceCost.monthlyDiscount.currency"
          as="norwegianTravelMonthlyDiscountCurrency"
  >
  </Result>
</GraphQLApi>
